syntax.uno: private static voidsetMarkers(Fuse.Controls.MapView view, object[] args) {}

comment.full:
Replaces the MapView's markers.

The following format is used for describing map markers:

    {
        latitude: 0,
        longitude: 0,
        label: "Hello, world!"
    }

## Example

The following example places a map marker at Fuse's home in Oslo, Norway.

    <NativeViewHost>
        <MapView ux:Name="myMapView" />
    </NativeViewHost>

    <JavaScript>
        myMapView.setMarkers([
            { latitude: 59.911567, longitude: 10.741030, label: "Fuse HQ" }
        ]);
    </JavaScript>

parameters.name: markers
parameters.description: Either a single object describing a map marker, or an array of them.
